events.message: I just received my order, but the laptop screen has multiple scratches and cracks. It looks damaged and unusable.
The issue has been categorized under Product Defect due to the customer's report of scratches and cracks on the laptop screen.
Support agent Alice has been assigned to handle the customer's complaint regarding the damaged laptop screen.
Hello, this is Alice from support. Iâ€™m sorry to hear about the damage to your laptop screen. Let me assist you with this issue.
Could you please provide photos showing the scratches and cracks on the laptop screen so we can assess the damage further?
I have attached several photos showing the damaged screen as requested. It is quite disappointing to receive it in this condition.
Thank you for the photos. We will send a replacement unit to you immediately and arrange for the damaged laptop to be picked up at no extra cost.
I appreciate the quick response and the offer to replace the laptop. Looking forward to receiving the new unit soon.
The replacement laptop has been shipped and the pickup for the damaged one is scheduled. Please check your email for tracking details.
We wanted to follow up and ensure you have received the replacement laptop and that everything is functioning properly.
Yes, I received the new laptop yesterday and it is in perfect condition. Thank you very much for the excellent support.
The case has been closed as the replacement was delivered successfully and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
